scripts.install: dotnet add package Dapr.AspNetCore --version 1.14.0 && dotnet add package Dapr.Client --version 1.14.0 && dotnet add package MediatR --version 11.0.0 && dotnet add package MediatR.Extensions.Microsoft.DependencyInjection --version 11.0.0 && dotnet add package Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi --version 8.0.8 && dotnet add package StackExchange.Redis --version 2.8.24 && dotnet add package Swashbuckle.AspNetCore --version 6.4.0 && dotnet add package CloudinaryDotNet --version 1.22.0 && dotnet add package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer --version 8.0.0 && dotnet add package System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt --version 8.0.0
